The video was published on Facebook on A: 2020, along with a caption stating that the chant of "Islam Zindabad" was being raised in Kolkata, the capital city of West Bengal, India.
The slogan: Islam Zindabad" translates to "long live Islam" in English.
The video was also shared on other socia: such as Facebook and Twitter, with similar claims.
A reverse image search on Google found a: showing a protest by Islami Andolon Bangladesh outside the Myanmar embassy in Bangladesh's capital, Dhaka.
